Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: i was nervous about the "look" of this camera because it is mounted low enough for people to get a good look at it. i was pleasantly surprised at the look and the feel of it and would recommend it to anyone. the only problem is that the indicator light stopped working after only a couple of weeks.

Reviews.Title: Nice Item
Reviews.Author: Danny Wyke
Reviews.Content: Was eveything I though it would be.Workd great and love the sensor  light really looks athenic. great price and very well made

ProductInfo.Features:
Fake Dummy IR Camera easy to install with mounting bracket & screws
Built-in light sensor will turn on flash light at night automatically. A power switch can shut off flash light when you need
Increase your security at a fraction of the cost of real cameras
Mix dummy & real cameras to increase your security value
Staff & thieves will never know it is a dummy. The camera requires 2 x AAA batteries (Not Included)
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Dummy Fake Security Camera Imitation IR Style CCTV Surveillance Flashing Light with Free Security Warning Decal CPX
